comment: Tara is very easy to understand and she genuinely wants you to succeed in her class! she is willing to help you with anything you don't understand in the class. She is young and is very easy to relate to. Math 1111 was a breeze with her and I actually wasn't bored out of my mind. Take her if you can!

This teacher is awesome! She is very helpful and extremely nice! Everything is super easy whether you like math or not. She really wants you to understand and shes excited to teach. She skips over all the BS things that she believes are pointless and not used in the real world which is awesomee!

Tara is an awesome math teacher! she gets through the material quickly (only what we need to know for tests/quizzes). generally, she lets class out a half hour early and has hands-down the BEST study guides. easy on the eyes too, sign up
Easy A if math is not your worst subject.  Great teacher if math is your worst subject.  She really wants you to understand.  Gives extra credit and will work with your schedule if you need help.

Class is not a easy A if math is not your thing, but this teacher is very nice and does give you extra credit so you can understand what you are doing.  She gives you her cell # and will meet with you to help you.  Take her if math is not your thing,  She will help you.

she is very easy......she gives TONS of extra credit. A class before the test she gives a pretest in which every question is the same on the test just diff numbers. AND SHE DOES THE PRETEST IN CLASS WITH YOU. no reason you should get below a A
